html:
7.5.16  1:18 am   The expert mode page has something called "vacationing in the center of the earth" which I'm guessing got lost in the Japan shuffle. Did you just decide not to release it?


embedded answer: https://billwurtz.com/questions/vacationing-in-the-center-of-the-earth.html


7.5.16  1:18 am   The expert mode page has something called "vacationing in the center of the earth" which I'm guessing got lost in the Japan shuffle. Did you just decide not to release it?

     

6.21.16  3:51 am   in expert mode, what is vacationing in the center of the earth? it's the only one that doesn't link to anything.

     

5.25.16  1:24 pm   What happened to vacationing in the center of the earth?

     

     the expert page does not have to have videos. it can have any range of things, including just a statement, like "y2k or whatever" or "vacationing in antarctica." the two times when i said "vacationing" were times during which there were no video releases. i posted the statement to fill the void. but in both cases, i was extremely busy, in 2015 i was working on song recording techniques, and in 2016 i was finishing the history of japan video

html:
7.5.16  12:11 am   what is your favorite font


embedded answer: https://billwurtz.com/questions/font.html


7.5.16  12:11 am   what is your favorite font

     

7.3.16  8:10 pm   how come you use the default font?

     

6.21.16  7:46 pm   what fonts do you like and why?

     

6.18.16  8:45 pm   what is your favorite font?

     twitter.com/billwurtz/status/622393659728617472

6.13.16  7:23 pm   what's your favorite font to use in your videos

     i gave up on choosing fonts because it was just an extra thing to worry about, and also would make it too obvious that i am not a fontsmith. to keep it simple i use the default font (helvetica) almost 100% of the time. courrier can be neat occasionally, and times sometimes. i find it's best to keep it simple, otherwise you draw too much attention to the font

5.7.16  2:13 am   What font do you use.. Helvetica? and why?

     i used to worry about different fonts for everything, but that became not only a waste of time, but also distracting from a viewing standpoint. i ultimately made a decision to actually use the default font for everything. it gave me a lot of creative clarity, and greater efficiency. i learned it's better to focus on your strong points, and don't worry about things that are not your strong points. i don't make my own fonts, and i don't have access to a large font libary, so this would not be a strong point. by religiously using the default font only, i found that i could instantly put all my focus on things that are my strong points -- positioning, angles, motion, and timing.

4.5.16  9:45 pm   What's your favorite font?

     braille

html: 7.4.16  5:58 pm   I used to play guitar but became very bored of playing. Learning songs is boring, playing in front of people has no positive effect (it's like playing normally but making a mistake is more embarassing), and I hate learning about music stuff. I find that playing my own little creations is more interesting than anything else but I do not find learning new things fun. So I don't exactly have any idea of what to do about my guitar situation. I have some skill in playing, but no knowledge or want for knowledge of music. I haven't played for months at this point and have considered playing more but I do not know what to play. So I guess what I'm trying to ask through all of this, is, have you gone through times like this, where you do not like music and don't want to play? And, how long did you take to really figure out what you want to do in music? I have a feeling I am thinking about this with too much structure.
original_html: 7.4.16  5:58 pm   I used to play guitar but became very bored of playing. Learning songs is boring, playing in front of people has no positive effect (it's like playing normally but making a mistake is more embarassing), and I hate learning about music stuff. I find that playing my own little creations is more interesting than anything else but I do not find learning new things fun. So I don't exactly have any idea of what to do about my guitar situation. I have some skill in playing, but no knowledge or want for knowledge of music. I haven't played for months at this point and have considered playing more but I do not know what to play. So I guess what I'm trying to ask through all of this, is, have you gone through times like this, where you do not like music and don't want to play? And, how long did you take to really figure out what you want to do in music? I have a feeling I am thinking about this with too much structure.

11.16.16  6:06 pm   Dear William of the Wurtz clan, I am writing to you on this wonderful autumn evening with a desire, and that desire is to receive information. Before I state what the information i seek is, i would like to provide a small amount of knowledge. There is a page on this very website known as "reality". Upon the first viewing of that website, a screen is shown that says "what's the password". I, as well as many others who are like me, click on the button that says " I don't know" I am seeking the password, as I am very interested in what may lie beyond that wall. I believe that the world will be a better, more loving place if you would disclose this to the public. I am aware that this article may not be publicly displayed on this section of your web page, but I do ask that it may. With love, {Z}
